title: XLA standalone
body_html: I don't know all the internals but what do you think to standalone XLA? I think that targetting HLO IR could be of general use also for other opensource projects. Expecially if the streamexecutor CUDA and OpenCL component it is mainlined in LLVM parallel-lib repository.

body: I don't know all the internals but what do you think to standalone XLA? I think that targetting HLO IR could be of general use also for other opensource projects. Expecially if the streamexecutor CUDA and OpenCL component it is mainlined in LLVM parallel-lib repository.
